projects.title: CollectorVerse Portfolio
projects.description: A playful, high-fidelity interface for managing Pokémon and Rick & Morty collectibles with rarity scoring.

haelo-component-library.title: Haelo Component Library v1
haelo-component-library.subtitle: Production-Grade Design System
haelo-component-library.description: A comprehensive component system built with precision and care, featuring premium polish and motion-driven interactions for modern web applications.
haelo-component-library.overview: Created a fully documented component library with 50+ components, each featuring smooth animations, accessibility compliance (WCAG AA), and comprehensive TypeScript support. The system includes light/dark mode, responsive design patterns, and a robust theming engine.

features.title: Motion System
features.description: Every component includes purposeful micro-interactions and state transitions

features.title: Accessibility First
features.description: WCAG AA compliant with keyboard navigation and screen reader support

features.title: Type Safety
features.description: Comprehensive TypeScript definitions with auto-completion support

collectorverse.title: CollectorVerse Portfolio
collectorverse.subtitle: Collectibles Management Platform
collectorverse.description: A playful, high-fidelity interface for managing Pokémon and Rick & Morty collectibles with rarity scoring and animated card interactions.
collectorverse.overview: Built an immersive portfolio manager with advanced filtering, rarity analytics, and stunning card reveal animations. Features include collection tracking, market value estimates, and social sharing capabilities.

features.title: Card Interactions
features.description: 3D flip animations with holographic effects and parallax hover states

features.title: Rarity Engine
features.description: Smart scoring system analyzing multiple attributes and market data

features.title: Collection Stats
features.description: Real-time dashboards with animated charts and completion tracking

quantflow.title: QuantFlow Trading Dashboard
quantflow.subtitle: Next-Gen Trading Interface
quantflow.description: A modern, high-performance trading platform featuring real-time charting, market heatmaps, and lightning-fast order execution.
quantflow.overview: Engineered a professional-grade trading interface with sub-millisecond updates, advanced charting tools, and intuitive order management. Supports multiple asset classes and exchange integrations.

features.title: Real-Time Updates
features.description: WebSocket-powered live data with optimized rendering for 60fps

features.title: Advanced Charts
features.description: TradingView-style charting with 20+ indicators and drawing tools

features.title: Quick Actions
features.description: One-click order placement with risk management controls

nebula-web3.title: Nebula Web3 Portfolio Manager
nebula-web3.subtitle: DeFi & NFT Portfolio Tracker
nebula-web3.description: A sleek Web3 portfolio interface with animated NFT galleries, token analytics, and seamless wallet integration.
nebula-web3.overview: Designed an elegant portfolio manager supporting multiple chains and wallets. Features include NFT collection views, token balance tracking, transaction history, and DeFi position monitoring.

features.title: Multi-Chain Support
features.description: Ethereum, Polygon, Arbitrum with unified portfolio view

features.title: NFT Gallery
features.description: Stunning grid layouts with 3D card flips and metadata display

features.title: Token Analytics
features.description: Price tracking, P&L calculations, and performance charts

pulse-ticker.title: Pulse Ticker Line
pulse-ticker.subtitle: Premium Stock Ticker Component
pulse-ticker.description: An elegant stock ticker with dynamic hover reveals, sentiment indicators, and mini sparkline charts.
pulse-ticker.overview: Created a highly polished ticker component with buttery smooth animations and intelligent data updates. Features auto-scrolling, hover pause, and expandable detail cards.

features.title: Smooth Scrolling
features.description: Infinite loop animation with intelligent content loading

features.title: Hover Details
features.description: Contextual popover with price history and company info

features.title: Sentiment Signals
features.description: Visual indicators for bullish/bearish market sentiment

cadenza-scheduler.title: Cadenza Smart Scheduler
cadenza-scheduler.subtitle: AI-Powered Calendar Component
cadenza-scheduler.description: A fluid scheduling interface with natural language processing, intelligent time suggestions, and layered popovers.
cadenza-scheduler.overview: Built an intelligent scheduling system that understands natural language inputs like 'coffee next Tuesday at 3pm'. Features smart conflict detection, attendee availability, and calendar sync.

features.title: Natural Language
features.description: Type in plain English to create events instantly

features.title: Smart Suggestions
features.description: AI-powered time slot recommendations based on patterns

features.title: Conflict Detection
features.description: Automatic overlap detection with resolution suggestions
